author: akritkbehera
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a segmentation fault in testRefInROOT::testGoodChain caused by calling SetBranchAddress() before the TChain had loaded its first tree.
TChain::SetBranchAddress() requires fTree to be initialized (fTreeNumber >= 0), which wasnt the case  resulting in null TBranch* pointers and a crash at runtime.
Also added a guard:
```CPP
if (nev == TTree::kMaxEntries) {
  return;
}
```
to safely exit when the chain entry count is invalid (e.g., missing or corrupt input files).
Reference: [Rework TChain::GetEntries to avoid side-effects](https://github.com/cms-sw/root/commit/53a2def9a0e4ce91443f0b0750b10c91de218d98)
title: [FWCore] Fix segmentation fault in testRefInROOT::testGoodChain when using TChain
